## logical

<dfn>A [data type](#data-type) representing `TRUE` or `FALSE` values.</dfn>

```{r}
true_logical_values <- list(
  TRUE,
  T,
  as.logical(1),
  "A" == "A"
)

false_logical_values <- list(
  FALSE,
  F,
  as.logical(0),
  "A" == "B"
)

str(true_logical_values)
str(false_logical_values)
```
